author: wn.com
title: Cohoes Resident Mark Frank Promoted To Lt. Colonel In The New York Army National Guard ...
text: ( Source : New York Division of Military and Naval Affairs) LATHAM, NY (10 /13/ 2015 )(readMedia)-- Mark Frank , a Cohoes resident and veteran of the wars in Afghanistan and Iraq , has been promoted to Lt. Col. in the New York Army National Guard .
